trans-unit.source: 8/10/2016 - Resolved: Unable to send emails to cgadmin@microsoft.com
trans-unit.target: 2016/8/10 - 已解决：无法将电子邮件发送到 cgadmin@microsoft.com

trans-unit.source: __Summary of Impact__: Between 8/5/2016 and 8/10/2016, customers were unable to send emails to cgadmin@microsoft.com, or use the Contact Us feature.
trans-unit.target: __影响摘要__：2016/8/5 - 2016/8/10 期间，客户不能将电子邮件发送到 cgadmin@microsoft.com，也不能使用“联系我们”功能。

trans-unit.source: __Root Cause__: Engineers identified the cause as a configuration change of the email account.
trans-unit.target: __根本原因__：工程师确定原因为电子邮件帐户的配置更改。

trans-unit.source: __Resolution__: Engineers worked to resolve the configuration issue.
trans-unit.target: __解决办法__：工程师努力解决了配置问题。

trans-unit.source: __Next Steps__: If you used the Contact Us link or sent mail to cgadmin@microsoft.com during this time and we have not responded, please try again.
trans-unit.target: __后续步骤__：如果在此期间使用了“联系我们”链接或向 cgadmin@microsoft.com 发送了电子邮件，但我们没有回复，请重试。

trans-unit.source: __Summary of Impact__: Between 7/11/2016 and 7/13/2016, a subset of customers experienced issues downloading items from the PowerShell Gallery.
trans-unit.target: __影响摘要__：2016/7/11 - 2016/7/13 期间，部分客户在从 PowerShell 库下载项目时遇到问题。

trans-unit.source: The issue likely manifested itself in the following error message returned from Install-Module/Install-Script and Save-Module/Save-Script:
trans-unit.target: 该问题可能会表现为从 Install-Module/Install-Script 或 Save-Module/Save-Script 返回的以下错误信息：

trans-unit.source: __Preliminary root cause__: Engineers identified an issue with Azure Content Deliver Network (CDN), which was deployed to the PowerShell Gallery on 7/11/2016.
trans-unit.target: __初始根本原因__：工程师发现 2016/7/11 部署到 PowerShell 库的 Azure Content Deliver Network (CDN) 出现问题。

trans-unit.source: __Mitigation__: Engineers disabled Azure CDN in the PowerShell Gallery.
trans-unit.target: __缓解__：工程师在 PowerShell 库中禁用 Azure CDN。

trans-unit.source: __Next Steps__: Investigate the underlying root cause and developing a solution to prevent future occurrences.
trans-unit.target: __后续步骤__：调查根本原因并制定解决方案，防止将来再次发生。

trans-unit.source: __Summary of Impact__: Between 5/17/2016 and 5/19/2016, a subset of customers experienced issues downloading items from the PowerShell Gallery.
trans-unit.target: __影响摘要__：2016/5/17 - 2016/5/19 期间，部分客户从 PowerShell 库下载项目时遇到问题。

trans-unit.source: The issue likely manifested itself in the following error message returned from Install-Module/Install-Script and Save-Module/Save-Script:
trans-unit.target: 该问题可能会表现为从 Install-Module/Install-Script 或 Save-Module/Save-Script 返回的以下错误信息：

trans-unit.source: __Preliminary root cause__: Engineers identified an outage in the underlying provider of Azure Content Deliver Network (CDN), which was deployed to the PowerShell Gallery on 5/17/2016.
trans-unit.target: __初始根本原因__：工程师发现 2016/5/17 部署到 PowerShell 库的 Azure Content Deliver Network (CDN) 的基础提供程序中断。

trans-unit.source: __Mitigation__: Engineers disabled Azure CDN in the PowerShell Gallery.
trans-unit.target: __缓解__：工程师在 PowerShell 库中禁用 Azure CDN。

trans-unit.source: __Next Steps__: Investigate the underlying root cause and developing a solution to prevent future occurrences.
trans-unit.target: __后续步骤__：调查根本原因并制定解决方案，防止将来再次发生。
